EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace Trading Remains Committed to Serving Customers 24/7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As the world evolves in reaction to recent events, we must evolve, too. Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) is doing three key things to ensure we are meeting our customers critical needs:
1 – HAT is now open online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. No matter what time it is, our electronic storefront provides pricing and availability in real-time.
2 – Hundreds of new listings are added weekly. This isn’t just stagnate inventory, we are constantly bringing in inventory and scanning all documents so they’re active listings on our storefront.
3 – We’re trying to stock what you need. GoDirect Trade provides real-time analytics on what you’re searching for. We are constantly reviewing and acting on the data so we “stock our shelves” right.
HAT remains strong, ready and prepared! SHOP ONLINE NOW <[[http://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Paul Vidano Honeywell Aerospace Trading, General Manager
